metadata.title: CVE-2024-1250 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.8 before 16.8.2. When a user is assigned a custom role withmanage_group_access_tokens permission, they may be able to create groupaccess tokens with Owner privileges, which may lead to privilegeescalation.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
